item.title: Christina Hendricks: Her Marriage and Divorce History, Explained
item.dc:creator: Simon Delott
item.description:
Reading Time: 4 minutesChristina Hendricks has experienced several ups and downs in her love life.

Christina Hendricks: Her Marriage and Divorce History, Explained was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 4 minutes

Christina Hendricks has both marriage and divorce in her history.

Part of the intense legacy of Mad Men is that it introduced a massive audience to the talented Christina Hendricks.

Her personal life has, at times, been an open book. She has spoken very directly about love, marriage, and divorce.

What is the beloved actress’ current relationship status?

Christina Hendricks met Geoffrey Arend in 2007

After years of guest and recurring appearances, Christina Hendricks landed the role of Joan P. Halloway on Mad Men.

Though her agency dropped her for taking a job that they were convinced was doomed, the decision paid off. Mad Men was a success, and her acting on the show brought her massive name recognition.

Mad Men was also how she met Geoffrey Arend. Arend, also an actor, is close friends with Mad Men actor Vincent Kartheiser.

In a Cosmopolitan UK interview March of 2012, Christina Hendricks would recall meeting Arend in 2007. It was, at the very least, interest at first sight.

“Geoffrey walked in and I was like, ‘Who is this guy?’ He had amazing hair and was all disheveled,” she described. Never underestimate the value of having good hair.

Hendricks elaborated: “He was running late and everyone was waiting for him. He just came in with this very high energy.”

Together, Christina Hendricks and Geoffrey Arend became puppy parents

“He was just charming, funny, and very magnetic,” Hendricks detailed. So, under the pretense of simply being friends, she got his number.

By December of 2008, Hendricks and Arend were engaged. On October 11, 2009, the two married in an intimate ceremony at a New York restaurant.

Together, they adopted two dogs, starting with a cockapoo puppy, ZuZu. Hendricks affirmed in various interviews that this was not “practice” for a human baby. But, if anything, it was practice for adopting another puppy — which they did.

However, it was not to last. Just days after Christina Hendricks and Geoffrey Arend’s 10-year wedding anniversary in October 2019, they announced their split in a joint statement on Instagram.

“Twelve years ago we fell in love and became partners. We joined our two amazing families, had countless laughs, made wonderful friends and were blessed with incredible opportunities,” the former couple began.

The statement affirmed: “Today we take our next step together, but on separate paths. We will always be grateful for the love we’ve shared and will always work together to raise our two beautiful dogs.

“We will be taking time to rediscover ourselves in this transition and we thank you for your patience and support in giving us the space to do so.”

Christina Hendricks found new love with George Bianchini

George Bianchini is a cinematographer who has worked on Hendricks’ Good Girls. The two became romantically linked in the public eye in 2021, but had already begun dating in 2020.

From that point, the two began appearing together in public and on social media.

In March of 2023, Christina Hendricks took to Instagram to share that she and George Bianchini had proposed to each other. Both had said “yes.”

On April 20, 2024, Christina Hendricks married George Bianchini at the historic Napoleon House in New Orleans.

It was a three-day weekend wedding, and the couple went overboard on floral decorations at the French Quarter landmark.

After Christina Hendricks’ divorce from Geoffrey Arend, she initially had doubts about whether a future marriage could work. But she found love again with George Bianchini, her new husband.

Christina Hendricks: Her Marriage and Divorce History, Explained was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: 13 Celebrities Who Look Just Like Cartoon Characters (#9 is Scary!)
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: < 1 minuteIt’s not unusual for celebrities to voice famous cartoon characters. We’ve already provided a list of 21 stars who you …

13 Celebrities Who Look Just Like Cartoon Characters (#9 is Scary!) was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

It’s not unusual for celebrities to voice famous cartoon characters.

We’ve already provided a list of 21 stars who you may not realize are behind such animated creations as Rapunzel, Donnie Thornberry and Brother Bear on The Berenstain Bears.

But celebrities who look like cartoon characters?

That may be a little less common. 

13 Stars Who Looks Like Cartoons

VIEW GALLERY

But there are plenty of examples out there, from a beloved pop singer who resembles a beloved mass murderer to the mother of a reality star who looks a lot like a really mean octopus.

Seriously. A LOT.

 

Click around the above photo gallery to be taken surprise by some of these lookalikes and then follow the proceeding link for a similarly-themed slideshow.

You want 9 Celebrity Disney Princess Doppelgangers? We’ve got 9 Celebrity Disney Princess Doppelgangers!

13 Celebrities Who Look Just Like Cartoon Characters (#9 is Scary!) was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Christina Hendricks Wants to Be on Game of Thrones?!
item.dc:creator: Tyler Johnson
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesChristina Hendricks already stars on one critically-acclaimed series but it seems the busty redheaded star of Mad Men may have …

Christina Hendricks Wants to Be on Game of Thrones?! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Christina Hendricks already stars on one critically-acclaimed series but it seems the busty redheaded star of Mad Men may have her sights set on another popular franchise.

Christina appeared on Conan last night where she discussed a comment she’d earlier made to reporters about her desire to appear on Game of Thrones.

Christina admitted that she’s "never seen" the show and was "confused" when she tried to watch an episode from Season 2, but still gives the wildly popular series as her number one answer when asked what sort of show she’d like to try next.

Explaining her off-the-cuff remark about a show she’s never watched, Christina said, "I was just thinking of all those pelts and horns and wolves and horses or whatever they have," likely causing fanboy heads to explode across the country.

With Mad Men entering its final season, it’s no wonder Christina wants to get on board with a show so popular its premiere crashed HBO Go and of course her famously curvaceous figure would fit right in with GOT‘s sexually-charged atmosphere. 

 

But a word of advice for future reference, Christina: before you discuss a show with rabidly obsessive fan base, make sure you check out an episode or two first.

Don’t make the same mistake as Ms. Hendricks. Watch Game of Thrones online at TV Fanatic and check out some of the show’s most beloved characters as you’ve never seen them before in the gallery below. 

Game of Thrones Characters In Real Life

VIEW GALLERY

Christina Hendricks Wants to Be on Game of Thrones?! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

33 Celebrities with Really, Really Big Boobs … How Big Are We Talking? was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
From Christina Hendricks to Kim Kardashian, and from Jessica Simpson to Katy Perry, these celebrities all have amazing boobs.

Amazingly large. Who knew 36H was even a real size?

There’s no denying it, so we might as well appreciate it! Here’s a look at the respective sizes of 33 famous women’s prized assets.

Some of which are almost hard to believe …
